scripts.lint: cd dent-app && pnpm lint && pnpm lint:biome
scripts.ci: pnpm format:check && pnpm lint && pnpm build:all && pnpm test:backend
scripts.pre-commit: pnpm format && pnpm lint:fix && pnpm build:all && pnpm test:backend
scripts.commit:frontend: cd dent-app && git add . && git status
scripts.commit:backend: cd dent-app-be && git add . && git status
scripts.commit:status: echo 'Frontend:' && cd dent-app && git status && echo '' && echo 'Backend:' && cd ../dent-app-be && git status
scripts.clean: cd dent-app && rm -rf .next node_modules && cd ../dent-app-be && mvn clean
